ALARK.IS.summary: Alarko Holding A.S. engages in the contracting, construction, land development, industry, trade, tourism, and energy businesses in Turkey and internationally. It designs, develops, and builds projects, such as airports, rail systems, infrastructure systems, power plants, industrial facilities, business centers, hotels, hospitals, etc. The company also engages in the power generation, distribution, and retail sale in Turkey. In addition, it manufactures air handling units and air roof top units under the CARRIER brand; conventional boilers and condensing combi boilers, as well as related auxiliary equipment, such as boilers, expansion tanks, unit heaters, plate exchangers, and radiator valves under the Alarko brand; heat meters and heat - cost allocators under the Techem brand; and submersible pumps and motors, circulation pumps, and booster pumps under the Alarko brand. Further, it operates hotels, sports centers, spa centers, and movie theaters; publishes Hillsider quarterly magazine; constructs, manages, and operates commercial and residential buildings; and designs and offers satellite towns. Additonally, the company offers marketing of industrial products and after sales services; and tools related to real estates. It also engages in supply of water and cleaning of lake projects; and subway construction, copper facility, and road construction projects, as well as construction and installation works. Alarko Holding A.S. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

BERA.IS.summary: Bera Holding A.S. operates in the paper and cardboard, machinery, oil, construction and building materials, marble, textiles, tourism, and food sectors worldwide. The company manufactures cut and roll paper, school notebooks, box files, drawing papers, office files, printed or plain computer streamline forms, bind or spiral attached notebooks with hard covers, reminder note cubes, parchment papers, packaging papers, A4/A5 blocks, and background cardboard varieties. It is also involved in the production and marketing of bearings; construction of movable and folding hydraulic cranes; provision of agricultural machines; and building of electrical and mechanical bases of construction and infrastructure. In addition, the company engages in the storage of liquid petroleum gas, as well as filling and distribution as bottled gas, flow gas, and car gas; and operation of gas stations and resting facilities. Further, it provides flour, tapioca, dry foods, pasta, biscuits, marshmallows, and wafers under the Golda and Melda brands, as well as bottled spring water; sells and distributes food, hygiene products, and other consumer goods to retailers, wholesalers, hotels, motels, and resorts; and operates hotels. Additionally, the company produces PVC doors and windows, cast concrete, marble, limestone, timber goods, glass panes, and MDF and MDF lamels; polar, velsoft, corduroy, velvet, viscose, and various cotton fabrics; marbles and minerals; and micronized calcide that is used in the production of paper, paint, plastic, glue, ceramic, carpet base, vinyl flooring, and toothpaste products, as well as in the construction, food, and pharmaceutical industries. The company was formerly known as Kombassan Holding A.S. and changed its name to Bera Holding A.S. in July 2017. Bera Holding A.S. was founded in 1988 and is based in Konya, Turkey.

BLCYT.IS.long_name: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
BLCYT.IS.summary: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the textile, agriculture, and tourism businesses in Turkey. The company offers cotton, polyester-viscose, and elastane yarns. It is also involved in the cotton unseed trading; and cotton and corn farming activities; and growing citrus and olive trees. Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1950 and is based in Adana, Turkey.

BRKSN.IS.long_name: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Üretim Ve Ticaret A.S.
BRKSN.IS.summary: Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells heat and sound insulation and industrial packaging materials in Turkey and internationally. It offers polyethylene, polypropylene, and cross-linked foams. The company also provides a range of services, such as interstory screed application, wall and roof insulation, soundproofing and thermal insulation, refrigerated cooler vehicle insulation, air conditioning inside and outside tools, sound and vibration isolation, and heat and noise prevention in mechanical installations. It sells its products under the Foamex, Polyberk, Proberk, Reflekt, Airpack, and Airfoam brand names. The company provides its services to the companies in the construction/industrial, packaging, fittings, automotive, footwear/bags, sea products, children playgroup, and sports/entertainment sectors. Berkosan Yalitim Ve Tecrit Maddeleri Ãretim Ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1993 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

DOHOL.IS.summary: Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, fuel, industry, financial services, internet, and entertainment and media businesses in Turkey. The company engages in the sale and distribution of petroleum products; production and trading of electricity from water, wind, and solar; producing steel wire ropes, industrial galvanized wires, industrial spring wires, bead wires, and concrete strands used in cranes, construction, oil and mining, ships, elevators, transportation vehicles, agricultural vehicles, and other areas; and manufacturing steering and suspension systems parts for various types of vehicles. It is also involved in sale activities of motorcycle and marine products; marketing business; mortgage, factoring, and financing activities; publishes newspapers, magazines, and books; produces movies, screenings, theater performances, and shows; offers actor management, casting agency, and video production; broadcasts network; publishes and broadcasts radio; and operation of netd.com, a video content platform, as well as hurriyetemlak.com, a real estate portal. In addition, the company engages in sale of books through its stores, as well as online. Further, it offers marine tourism services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ECZYT.IS.summary: Eczacibasi Yatirim Holding Ortakligi A.S., through its interests in affiliate companies, engages in the manufacture and sale of bathroom and kitchen faucets and bathroom accessories. It is also involved in the sale of construction and installation materials, as well as provides after-sales services; develops and produces smart cards; and invests in real estate. The company was founded in 1973 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Eczacibasi Yatirim Holding Ortakligi Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Eczacibasi Holding A.S.

GLYHO.IS.summary: Global Yatirim Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the port operations, energy generation, natural gas, mining, brokerage and asset management, real estate, and other businesses in Turkey. The company operates cruise and commercial port facilities; biomass power plants with an installed capacity of 29.2 MW; and power plants with 16.8 MWp installed capacity, as well as co/tri-generation with 54.1 MW of installed capacity. It is also involved in the compressed natural gas sales and distribution activities with 10 bulk CNG plants, 3 auto-CNG stations, 296 CNG road tankers, and 47 industrial-scale compressors; and feldspar mining and production business. In addition, the company develops and operates shopping centers, offices, residences, hospitals, schools, hotels, and industrial lands. Further, it offers asset management services; and securities and derivatives trading and portfolio management services to international and Turkish corporate investors. Additionally, it engages in the insurance agency, publishing, storage, food management, ship management, and marine vehicle trade businesses; and construction, maritime, tourism, and real estate investment businesses. The company was formerly known as Global Menkul Degerler A.S. and changed its name to Global Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi in October 2004. Global Yatirim Holding A.S. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

IHLAS.IS.summary: Ihlas Holding A.S. engages in the construction and real estate, media and communications, manufacturing and trading, education, and healthcare businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company operates through Construction, Marketing, Media, and Other segments. The company manufactures, markets, and sells electrical, electronic, and mechanical kitchen appliances; durable goods; and electrical home appliances. It also operates as an advertising, publicity, and photography agency, as well as a thermal spring tourism entrepreneur; and undertakes installation and contracting works. In addition, the company publishes, prints, distributes, markets, and sells newspapers, magazines, books, and various other publications; operates news agency, and hot spring and health facility; serves as a representative for real estate and durable/non-durable goods; markets bicycles, and mopeds and spare parts; provides IT and Internet services; sets up networks; trades in computers and computer components; and invests in, builds, operates, and sells tourism and health facilities. Further, it is involved in the manufacturing, assembling, trading, importing and exporting of various motorized and non-motorized vehicles, and spare parts; construction, installation, and undertaking of projects; tourism investments and management; real estate purchase and sales; representation, consultancy, import, export, and trading activities with regard to advertising, publicity, photography, publication and advertising agencies; production and marketing of catering; television and radio broadcasting activities; food production; and operation of shipping, personnel transport, and storage and bonded warehouse. Additionally, the company operates a hospital; and provides education services. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

ITTFH.IS.summary: Ittifak Holding A.S. engages in the retail, food, construction, machinery, agriculture, and livestock businesses in Turkey. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in SelÃ§uklu, Turkey.

KCHOL.IS.summary: KoÃ§ Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, engages in the energy, automotive, consumer durables, finance, and other businesses in Turkey and internationally. The company's energy business operates petroleum refineries; distributes petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases; and generates electricity through hydroelectric, natural gas, coal, thermal, and solar power and other renewable plants. It serves customers under the Akpa, Aygaz, Lipetgaz, Mogaz, Pursu, Aygaz Dogalaz, Demir Export, Ditas, Opet Fuchs, Opet, THY Opet, Tupras, and Entek brand names. The company's automotive business provides light commercial vehicles, passenger cars, tractors, buses, and trucks, as well as offers automotive retailing and car rental services. It serves customers under the KoÃ§ Fiat Kredi, Otokar, OtokoÃ§, Otoeksper, OtokoÃ§ Otomotiv, OtokoÃ§ Sigorta, Tofas, and TÃ¼rkTraktÃ¶r brand names, as well as trademarks through licensing agreements, such as Ford, Birmot, Budget, Avis, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Fiat, Jeep, Maserati, Ferrari, New Holland, and CASE IH. The company's consumer durables business offers white goods, televisions, and air conditioners under the ArÃ§elik, Beko, Leisure, Arctic, Altus, Blomberg, Defy, Elektra Bregenz, Flavel, and ArÃ§elik LG brand names. Its finance business provides various banking and financial products and services that include private banking, mutual funds, leasing, and credit cards under the KoÃ§finans, Yapi Kredi Bankasi, Yapi Kredi Faktoring, Yapi Kredi Leasing, Yapi Kredi KÃ¼ltÃ¼r Sanat Yayincilik, Yapi Kredi PortfÃ¶y YÃ¶netimi, Yapi Kredi Yatirim, Yapi Kredi Koray, and Yapi Kredi Bankasi brand names. The company's other business offers tomato products and pastes, canned pickles, and ketchups; and pasteurized milk, as well as do it yourself retailing and marina services under various brand names. The company was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.

KONTR.IS.long_name: Kontrolmatik Teknoloji Enerji Ve Muhendislik Anonim Sirketi
KONTR.IS.summary: Kontrolmatik Teknoloji Enerji Ve Muhendislik Anonim Sirketi provides consulting, feasibility studies, project management, engineering design, construction management, and procurement services. The company also provides advanced process control, computerized plant information systems, software projects and support, plant start-up and commissioning, IoT, and data analytics products and services. It serves oil and gas, power generation, power distribution and transmission, process industry, transportation, mining, agriculture, and food and beverage sectors. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

The company's energy business operates petroleum refineries; distributes petroleum products and liquefied petroleum gases; and generates electricity through hydroelectric, natural gas, coal, thermal, and solar power and other renewable plants. It serves customers under the Akpa, Aygaz, Lipetgaz, Mogaz, Pursu, Aygaz Dogalaz, Demir Export, Ditas, Opet Fuchs, Opet, THY Opet, Tupras, and Entek brand names. MIPAZ.IS.long_name: Milpa Ticari ve Sinai Ürünler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
MIPAZ.IS.summary: Milpa Ticari ve Sinai ÃrÃ¼nler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the real estate marketing business in Turkey. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. Milpa Ticari ve Sinai ÃrÃ¼nler Pazarlama Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. is a subsidiary of Dogan Sirketler Grubu Holding A.S.

MZHLD.IS.summary: Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S., through its subsidiaries, manufactures, sells, and markets various plastic pipes. It offers PVC and polyethylene pipes, and related parts and spare parts; and construction, agriculture, and infrastructure related pipes. The company is also involved in acquiring and selling of stocks. Mazhar Zorlu Holding A.S. was founded in1996 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey.

PSDTC.IS.summary: Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. engages in the export of ready-to-wear/ready-made garment products in Turkey. It also provides export intermediation services; and tax and foreign trade consultancy services related to tax, other financial legislations, customs, foreign exchange, export, import, inward processing, factoring, and Exim loans in foreign trade. In addition, the company offers legislation and bulletin services, such as changes and developments in tax and other financial legislation, and foreign trade legislation; and information sharing services, such as information about the seminars, panels, or conferences. Further, it organizes information meetings and panels. The company was formerly known as Pergamos Dis Ticaret A.S. and changed its name to Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. as a result of its merger with Status Dis Ticaret A.S. in 2005. Pergamon Status Dis Ticaret A.S. was founded in 2001 and is based in Izmir, Turkey.
